source.0f8452af:
#drawing dendogram
import scipy.cluster.hierarchy as shc

plt.figure(figsize=(50, 20))  
plt.title("Shopping Dendograms")  
dend = shc.dendrogram(shc.linkage(wc1, method='ward'))
source.5de4c2a6:
#Now clustering the data points
from sklearn.cluster import AgglomerativeClustering

cluster = AgglomerativeClustering(n_clusters=3, affinity='euclidean', linkage='ward')  
cluster_labels=cluster.fit_predict(wc1)  
print(cluster.labels_) 
print(cluster_labels) 

plt.scatter(wc1[:,0],wc1[:,1], c=cluster_labels, cmap='rainbow')
source.f476cbb8:
from sklearn.metrics import silhouette_score
silhouette_avg = silhouette_score(wc1, cluster_labels)
print("For n_clusters =", 3,
          "The average silhouette_score is :", silhouette_avg)
